title: De l'amour aka All about Love (2001) x264 DVDRIP
description:
SYNOPSIS: Cute and persuasive, with a loving family, boyfriend and best friend, 20-year-old Maria (Virginie Ledoyen) is used to getting her own way. After just one day of assembling chair cushions at a factory, Maria announces her hands ache and she'd rather open a restaurant.

Caught red-handed, Marie refuses to admit to shoplifting a lingerie item, and ends up in police custody. In a shocking yet believable development, Maria confronts the toughest situation of her young, relatively charmed life.

Ledoyen brings a perfect blend of naivete and girlish defiance to the tailor-made role of Maria. Other thesps, who include co-scripter Yazid Ait as her serious-minded boyfriend and popular rap star Stomy Bugsy as the latter's drug-dealing best friend, lend all the shades of gray required to make their characters feel real at every turn.

Bruno Coulais delivers a score that starts out small and finishes in full-blown urgency, like the imagery it accompanies.

Richet does an even-handed job of presenting the complexity of lifestyle choices in the industrial suburbs where upward mobility is possible but elusive, and people of many ethnicities are intimate neighbors.

IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0269138/
